paragraphs.text:
val books = spark.read.format("csv")
  .option("sep", ",")
  .option("inferSchema", "true")
  .option("header", "true")
  .load("books.csv")
  
 val ratings = spark.read.format("csv")
  .option("sep", ",")
  .option("inferSchema", "true")
  .option("header", "true")
  .load("ratings.csv")
 
  val to_read = spark.read.format("csv")
  .option("sep", ",")
  .option("inferSchema", "true")
  .option("header", "true")
  .load("to_read.csv")

paragraphs.text:
val filtred_books = new_books.filter("language_code is not null and original_publication_year is not null")

filtred_books.orderBy(asc("original_publication_year")).show

filtred_books: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [id: int, book_id: int ... 6 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
// second aggrigation, join books and average ratings then count average rating by author

val books_with_rating = filtred_books.join(average_rating, filtred_books("book_id") === average_rating("book_id")).withColumnRenamed("avg(rating)","rating")

val rating_of_autors = books_with_rating.groupBy("authors").agg(avg("rating"))

rating_of_autors.orderBy(desc("avg(rating)")).show()

paragraphs.text:
// third agregation 
val count_to_read = to_read.groupBy("book_id").agg(count("*"))

val books_with_to_read = filtred_books.join(count_to_read, filtred_books("book_id") === count_to_read("book_id"))

val popular_year = books_with_to_read.groupBy("original_publication_year").agg(sum("count(1)")).withColumnRenamed("sum(count(1))","count_to_read")

popular_year.orderBy(asc("count_to_read")).show()
